children.name: use_custom_search_results_template
children.label: Use custom search results page
children.inline_help_text: Turn this setting on to use a custom search results page instead of the default global search results page.

children.name: path_id
children.label: Search results page
children.inline_help_text: This is where people will go when they click to search their search term. Make sure to choose a page that contains the search results module.
